title: benignlooking
extract: Benign describes a range of qualities, all of them positive. When talking about a person, it means "gentle." ... In some other contexts, it simply means "not harmful"; you might speak of "a benign tumor" or "an environmentally benign chemical."
extract_html: Benign describes a range of qualities, all of them positive. When talking about a person, it means "gentle." ... In some other contexts, it simply means "not harmful"; you might speak of "a benign tumor" or "an environmentally benign chemical."
